title: [英文] 句子唔一定要有動詞

replies.msg:
例子:
Pride and Prejudice is one of the world’s most famous love stories … how? How could there be any romance, any love, when there was no equality? When females were wedding-night virgins, dependants with little freedom and less respect?

I worry about their future. The horror of a naive virgin’s wedding night; the boredom of a life spent in drawing rooms. No contraception or divorce.

Source: https://www.theguardian.com/stage/2017/sep/01/sara-pascoe-how-i-overcame-my-jane-austen-prejudice

第一句係問句黎wo ching
第二句係佢詳述個future指d乜...唔算係獨立句, 你可能會問點解佢前一句用full stop而唔用en dash, 呢個我都冇深究
